component.name: listItemsInMenu
component.description: Returns a list of items in either the Salesforce app drop-down menu or the Salesforce1 navigation menu.

component.name: tabs
component.description: Returns a list of all tabs.

component.name: themes
component.description: Gets the list of icons and colors used by themes in the Salesforce application.

component.name: listAppMenuTypes
component.description: Retrieves a list of App Menu types in the Salesforce app dropdown menu.

component.name: listAppMenuItems
component.description: Retrieves a list of the App Menu items in the Salesforce Lightning dropdown menu.

component.name: listAppMenuMobileItems
component.description: Retrieves a list of the App Menu items in the Salesforce mobile app for Android and iOS and the mobile web navigation menu.

component.name: returnHeadersForAppMenuItems
component.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the listAppMenuItems operation.

component.name: returnHeadersForAppMenuMobileItems
component.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the listAppMenuMobileItems operation.

component.name: returnHeadersForTabs
component.description: Retrieves only the headers that are returned by the tabs operation.
